Cafe Shillong Bed and BreakfastFrequently Asked Questions About Hotels In ShillongJoin our travel community for the latest tips, guides, and exclusive offers!Subscribe You have already subscribed our newsletter!Thanks for Subscribing our newsletter!If you are planning to go on a natural retreat in the enchanting state of Meghalaya with our Meghalaya Holiday Packages, we have a curated list of the best hotels in Shillong just for you to enjoy a relaxing stay after a fun-filled day here. Popularly known as the “Scotland of the East” – Shillong is a picturesque hill station that has captivated its travelers with its serene beauty and natural charm. This hill station is a beautiful blend of vibrant culture and colonial buildings like the best churches in Shillong, museums, administrative buildings from the British era, etc. The natural charm of Shillong attracts a large number of adventure seekers with its array of waterfalls, rolling hills and valleys which provides the opportunity for you to indulge in some of the best things to do in Shillong like – watersports, waterfall exploration, hiking and trekking in Shillong. Explore these charms of Shillong on your trip to Meghalaya with the range of comfortable hotels in Shillong to choose from, complimented by the heartwarming hospitality of the locals.From a cozy retreat nestled in the lap of nature to luxurious accommodation with all modern amenities or a charming boutique stay that exudes the local or colonial charm, spoils travelers with options. Whether you are a backpacker looking for homestays, Airbnb, hostels, or budget hotels in Shillong, or a couple seeking a romantic getaway, the hotels in Shillong for couples, will definitely add up to your amazing vacation to this hill station. Join us on a journey through the finest hotels in Shillong, where comfort, elegance, and the allure of the surrounding landscape seamlessly intertwine to create an unforgettable getaway experience.Best Hotels in Shillong1. Vivanta MeghalayaSource : TripAdvisor”The Vivanta Meghalaya is one of the best 5 star hotels in Shillong, nestled in the heart of the city. Located in the city center, this property is just walking distance of some of the iconic landmarks of Shillong like the Ward’s lake and Police Bazaar. Vivanta Meghalaya seamlessly blends luxury, nature and culture with an immersive stay experience.From deluxe rooms to lavish suites, you will have several rooms to choose from according to your comfort with panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. This hotel also has an in-house restaurant “Azure” that serves local and international cuisine, “The Cabana” which offers an al fresco dining experience by the pool, and an “Unwind” bar to sip your favorite cocktails.The Vivanta Meghalaya also has an outdoor pool and fitness center to maintain your routine. The Jiva Spa offers a perfect relaxing experience, which makes this one of the popular choices amongst the other hotels in Shillong for couples. A range of rejuvenating treatments that draw inspiration from traditional Indian wellness practices, adds to your relaxing vacation experience.Location: Police BazaarCost: ₹8000 – ₹150002. Courtyard by MarriottSource : TripAdvisor”Nestled in the heart of Shillong, the Courtyard by Marriott is one of the best 5 star hotels in Shillong. This luxury hotel offers great views of the surrounding landscape with a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.There are a variety of rooms in Courtyard by Marriott to choose from – Standard rooms to Spacious suites with modern amenities, to ensure a peaceful stay for travelers. This hotel also has an in-house restaurant “The View” which offer which offers a variety of local and international cuisine to relish your taste buds along with stunning views of the city and surrounding hills. The Courtyard by Marriott in Shillong also has a fitness center to maintain your wellness routine along with a spa for those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation. This hotel also has an event space for gatherings, business meetings, and seminars, thus making it an ideal choice for leisure and business travelers. The recreational spaces like the open dining area, swimming pool and indoor games room make Courtyard by Marriott a popular hotels in Shillong for Couples and Families. Thus, booking this hotel in advance is one of the Meghalaya Travel Tips you should know if you are travelling in peak season.Location: Jail Road, Police BazarCost: ₹10000 – ₹170003. M Crown HotelSource : TripAdvisor”The M Crown Hotel is one of the best 4 star hotels in Shillong, located right in the city center. The warm hospitality and the best location of the hotel in Shillong, make it an ideal choice for those seeking a well-rounded experience of the city.From standard rooms to Suites, each room in this hotel is well-furnished and caters to the diverse preferences of the visitors. The rooms are equipped with modern amenities to ensure a hassle-free experience for guests. The staff of this hotel is very warm and welcoming and will also provide local insights and sightseeing suggestions.While this hotel does not have an in-house restaurant, its strategic location offers easy access to a variety of dining options around. Travelers can explore the local eateries and savor the local cuisine of Meghalaya, and soak in this culinary adventure. Location: MarBa Hub, Police BazarCost: ₹5000 – ₹70004. Hotel Polo TowersSource : tripadvisor”Located in the charming landscape of Shillong, Hotel Polo Towers stands as a prominent landmark and is one of the best 4 star hotels in Shillong. The Polo Towers Hotel offers a seamless blend of modern luxury and the scenic beauty of Meghalaya and provides guests with easy access to local attractions and day exploration.The well-decorated rooms in this hotel range from Deluxe to Executive suites, catering to the diverse needs of travelers, with all the modern amenities to ensure a relaxing and enjoyable stay. The rooms offer panoramic views of the surrounding hills and the bustling cityscape, allowing guests to soak in the beauty of Shillong.The cozy in-house restaurant “The Shillong Cafe” offers a variety of cuisines from local flavors to international cuisine to relish your taste buds. Hotel Polo Towers also has a well-equipped fitness center,  for the guests to maintain their wellness routine.Location: Polo Grounds, ShillongCost: ₹4000 – ₹6500Also Read: Valleys in Meghalaya: Exploring Nature’s Masterpieces in Northeast India5. The Heritage Club – Tripura CastleSource : tripadvisor”The Heritage Club – Tripura Castle is one of the hotels in Shillong that offers a combination of colonial charm and modern comfort. This beautiful hotel is an ideal choice for travelers seeking unique and lavish comfort close to the city center of Shillong. The picturesque setup of this hotel makes it one of the most popular hotels in Shillong for couples to spend some quality time together.The hotel offers exquisitely designed rooms and suites that reflect the heritage and royalty of this property. Each room is adorned with antique furniture that takes you back in time. The attentive and friendly staff provides good service that elevates the overall experience of this hotel.The Heritage Club – Tripura Castle does not have an in-house restaurant, but the staff is more than willing to offer recommendations and assist in making dining arrangements, ensuring that guests can savor the flavors of Shillong to their heart’s content.Location: Tripura Castle Rd, Cleave ColonyCost: ₹3000 – ₹55006. The Loft – Executive InnSource : tripadvisor”The Loft – Executive Inn is a charming boutique hotel that offers a blend of comfort and convenience. Located near the Shillong city center, this hotel provides easy access to Shillong’s major attractions and tourist landmarks. This is one of the hotels in Shillong which is surrounded by local markets, eateries, and cultural hotspots, guests can immerse themselves in the local culture and flavors.You can choose from cozy standard rooms to spacious suites that are tastefully designed according to the taste and preferences of the guests. The rooms have modern furniture and amenities to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay here. The hotel also has a lounge area for you to unwind, socialize and relax for some time.The Loft Executive Inn may not feature in-house restaurants, it invites guests to embark on a culinary journey in the nearby eateries, sampling local delicacies and international cuisines alike. The hotel’s attentive staff is more than willing to provide recommendations, ensuring that guests can savor the diverse flavors of Shillong.Location: Laitumkhrah, ShillongCost: ₹4500 – ₹9000Also Read: 10 Outstanding Homestays To Go for On a Visit To Meghalaya7. The Golf RetreatSource : TripAdvisor”The Golf Retreat in Shillong is one of the few hotels in Shillong that blends modern comforts and nature. Nestled in the captivating landscape of Shillong, against the backdrop of Shillong Golf Course, this retreat offers an opportunity for the guests to immerse themselves in the beauty of nature while being in close proximity to the city’s attractions.The retreat offers a range of well-appointed rooms that cater to the preferences of its guests. From Deluxe Rooms to Suites, each accommodation option is thoughtfully designed with modern amenities and elegant furnishings, ensuring a comfortable and rejuvenating stay. The large windows offer sweeping views of the golf course and the surrounding hills.The retreat features a terrace area where guests can relax and soak in the natural beauty that surrounds them, making it one of the best hotels in Shillong for couples. The attentive service of the staff adds to the charm of the stay, creating an atmosphere that is both welcoming and comforting. While The Golf Retreat may not feature in-house restaurants, it provides an opportunity for guests to explore local dining options.Location: Golf Link – Marwroh, Mawpun, ShillongCost: ₹3500 – ₹50008. Hotel Heiga VNSSource : tripadvisor”Located in close proximity to Lady Hydari Park, Hotel Heiga VNS is a cozy retreat and one of the best hotels in Shillong to stay around the city center. The location of this hotel provides easy access to the city’s major tourist landmarks and serves as a relaxing place to unwind after a day of exploration.The hotel features a variety of well-appointed rooms designed to cater to the diverse preferences of its guests. From comfortable Standard Rooms to more spacious Deluxe Rooms, each accommodation is equipped with modern amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. This hotel does not have an in-house restaurant but its strategic location will give you a chance to explore the local market and have local dishes in the eateries there.The hotel offers attentive service to ensure that guests’ needs are met, and arrangements for local transportation and sightseeing can be easily organized. The hotel’s focus on personalized service adds a touch of warmth to the stay, making guests feel welcome and well-cared for.Location: Upper Lachumiere Dhankheti ShillongCost: ₹4000 – ₹6500Also Read: The Best National Parks In Meghalaya For Wildlife Enthusiasts9. The Centre PointSource : tripadvisor”The Centre Point hotel boasts a convenient location that allows guests to immerse in the bustling local life while enjoying a cozy stay in the hotel. Located in the city center of the hill station, The Centre Point is one of the best hotels in Shillong for couples as well, with a good base to explore the city’s attractions.The surroundings of this hotel exude a dynamic energy as you will be in close proximity to Shillong’s vibrant markets, cultural landmarks and entertainment hubs. The comfortable and well-furnished rooms provide a comfortable stay despite the city’s buzzing nightlife. From standard rooms to spacious Deluxe rooms, you can choose amongst these rooms equipped with modern amenities as per your preference. Some of the rooms here offer panoramic views of the hills and the Shillong peak on one side and the city views on the other, making it a preferred choice of hotels in Shillong for couples and people seeking a peaceful vacation.The warm and welcoming hospitality of the staff here will ensure to provide you an enjoyable stay with their attentive services. While The Centre Point Hotel does not have any in-house restaurants, it encourages travelers to relish in the local cuisine and the staff here will readily provide you with some recommendations.Location: Khyndailad, Police BazarCost: ₹4000 – ₹650010. Cafe Shillong Bed and BreakfastSource : tripadvisor”Cafe Shillong Bed and Breakfast is one of the best hotels in Shillong for budget travelers with a homely vibe. The overall stay experience here is reliving the colonial days amongst the lush surroundings but also being in close proximity to the city’s iconic landmarks.Cafe Shillong Bed and Breakfast offers a range of comfortable rooms that cater to the preferences of its guests. From cozy Standard Rooms to more spacious Suites, each accommodation option exudes a homey ambiance. The rooms are thoughtfully designed with modern amenities to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay.While the bed and breakfast may not feature an in-house restaurant, it offers a unique opportunity for guests to experience local flavors. The bed and breakfast exude a personalized charm, with attentive staff offering assistance and local insights to ensure a pleasant stay.Location: Lachumiere, ShillongCost: ₹2500 – ₹5500Get exclusive travel insights & updates into your inbox!Subscribe *By clicking subscribe you'll receive emails from WanderOn.You have already subscribed our newsletter!Thanks for Subscribing our newsletter!Shrutika Parab★★★★★24 May 2024“Thank you Team Wanderon for the amazing Ladakh Experience.
